activities: SAI Global Compliance, Inc. formally known as Compliance and Ethics Learning Solutions Corporation conduct the following activies wherein Personal Information is received from the EU and/or Switzerland: For the purposes of providing and reporting on training, SAI Global Compliance, Inc. collects information such as student name, e-mail address, unique student identification, department, job title, password, supervisor information, course progress and test scores. In addition, when visitors request certain optional information from our corporate website, we collect the visitor's name; title; company; e-mail; phone number and other information. In connection with providing hotline reporting, incident reporting and case management services that record compliance and ethics issues reported by an organization's employees or the public at large, names and e-mail addresses along with other reported personally identifiable information may be collected.  We do not use personally identifiable information for any purpose other than that for which the information was originally collected.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All personal information we handle in connection with our Customer Learning, Hotline, Incident Reporting and Case Management Sites and our corporate website.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) & Swiss FDPIC
